segments.text: I can't help but notice the unstable stool supporting the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed outward at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks as though it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, putting extra weight on one side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry he's going to fall backward onto the hard floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him doesn't seem to notice the danger, only the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is incredibly tense to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stabilize that stool before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pure luck it hasn't given way already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could really hurt him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and steady it myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every slight shift in his weight makes me flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR
